description: Dimitri Kane is the master of using a mobile app to meet his next hot hookup. The well is drying up as he’s running low on matches with gay guys in his radar. Dimitri decides it’s time to tap into the straight market by switching his gender to “female” on the app. He is bound to make some curious straight dudes swipe right. After all, it’s no secret that some straight guys would love to know what it’s like to hook up with another guy, just one time. Dimitri’s profile has attracted straight guy and neighbor, Will Braun, who is down to have some fun with his latest match.
title: Swipe Part 1
